metadata.Title: CVE-2021-22118 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Spring Framework, versions 5.2.x prior to 5.2.15 and versions 5.3.x prior to 5.3.7, a WebFlux application is vulnerable to a privilege escalation: by (re)creating the temporary storage directory, a locally authenticated malicious user can read or modify files that have been uploaded to the WebFlux application, or overwrite arbitrary files with multipart request data.

notes.Note: seth-arnold> I didn't find code in our packages that looks like the patch.

criterions.comment: libspring-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
